009package imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay;
010
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.shape.ShapeProducer;
013
014import java.awt.Shape;
015import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
016
017/** 
018 * Interface specifying a 2D triangle.
019 */
020public interface Triangle extends ShapeProducer {       // TODO: better integrate with other 2D primitives
021
022        /**
023         * Returns an array of points used by the triangulation in the order of their insertion.
024         *
025         * @return an array of points
026         */
027        public Pnt2d[] getPoints();
028        
029        @Override
030        public default Shape getShape(double scale) {
031                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
032                Pnt2d[] pts = this.getPoints();
033                Pnt2d a = pts[0];
034                Pnt2d b = pts[1];
035                Pnt2d c = pts[2];
036                path.moveTo(a.getX(), a.getY());
037                path.lineTo(b.getX(), b.getY());
038                path.lineTo(c.getX(), c.getY());
039//              path.lineTo(a.getX(), a.getY());
040                path.closePath();
041                return path;
042        }
043        
044}
045
